privacyPage.hero_desc: At ECC, we deeply understand the sensitivity of "bank client data." Privacy and information security are not just words to us; they are the foundation of our work and part of our regulatory compliance.

intro.title: What data do we collect & why?
intro.desc: We are a "services" company, meaning our role is executive. The data we handle comes from two main sources:
intro.source1: Data from assigned Banks: Received under official mandate to perform investigation or collection tasks.
intro.source2: Data you provide: Such as sending your CV for recruitment or filling out a contact form.

cards.jobs_text: If you send us your CV, rest assured it stays with the HR department only and is used solely for recruitment purposes.
cards.ads_text: Data from ad forms is used solely to respond to your inquiries regarding our services.

sharing.title: Do we share your data?
sharing.text_body: We do not sell or rent data. Bank data is a red line, and applicant data is a trust we keep.
